venue.address_2: between Anthony's Pier 4 & World Trade Ctr
venue.name: Atlantic Beer Garden

item.description:
Aye Aye Cap'n! Time to get all ship-shape and rummed up, me hearties!

The Tall Ships (i.e. 50 of the remaining 'real' sailing ships of the world under the guise of "Sail Boston '09") are in Boston Harbor from 8th-13th of July. On Thursday the ships docked at Fish Pier will be open for viewing from 5pm-10pm (or just walk along the dock and practice your best pirate accent).

Let's meet at 7.30pm at:
Atlantic Beer Garden
146 Northern Ave
Boston, MA 02110

We can drink, eat and then meander along the dock.

Best transport is Silver line (bus) from South Station to 'Courthouse' (or a short walk).
No dress code. As the Tall Ships are there, it may well be busy but we'll see what we can do.

See http://www.sailboston... for more details.

See you there,
Steve O.
cell 978-289-2364

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Aye Aye Cap'n! Tall Ships Thursday
